member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule
member.summary: HTTP module that sends an e-mail whenever an unhandled exception occurs in an ASP.NET web application.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle requests.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.OnError(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The handler called when an unhandled exception bubbles up to the module.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.ReportErrorAsync(GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Schedules the error to be e-mailed asynchronously.
member.remarks: The default implementation uses the to queue the reporting.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.ReportError(GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Schedules the error to be e-mailed synchronously.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.PreSendMail(System.Net.Mail.MailMessage,GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Provides a final point (mainly for inheritors) to customize the e-mail message before it is sent.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.DisposeMail(System.Net.Mail.MailMessage)
member.summary: Disposes the e-mail message after sending it, like deleting any temporary files created for attachements.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.CreateErrorFormatter
member.summary: Creates the implementation to be used to format the body of the e-mail.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.SendMail(System.Net.Mail.MailMessage)
member.summary: Sends the e-mail using .

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.GetConfig
member.summary: Gets the configuration object used by to read the settings for module.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.GetLastError(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Builds an object from the last application exception generated.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.MailSender
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address of the sender.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.MailRecipient
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address of the recipient, or a semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses in case of multiple recipients.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailModule.MailSubjectFormat
member.summary: Gets the text used to format the e-mail subject.
member.remarks: The subject text specification may include {0} where the error message () should be inserted and {1} where the error type should be insert.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorHtmlPage
member.summary: Renders an HTML page displaying the detailed host-generated (ASP.NET) HTML recorded for an error from the error log.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorPageBase
member.summary: Provides the base implementation and layout for most pages that render HTML for the error log.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog
member.summary: An implementation that uses Microsoft SQL Server 2000 as its backing store.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog
member.summary: Represents an error log capable of storing and retrieving errors generated in an ASP.NET Web application.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.Log(GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Logs an error in log for the application.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.GetError(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a single application error from log given its identifier, or null if it does not exist.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.GetErrors(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Retrieves a page of application errors from the log in descending order of logged time.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.Name
member.summary: Get the name of this log.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets the name of the application to which the log is scoped.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorLog.Default
member.summary: Gets the default error log implementation specified in the configuration file, or the in-memory log implemention if none is configured.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.#ctor(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using a dictionary of configured settings.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class to use a specific connection string for connecting to the database.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.Log(GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Logs an error to the database.
member.remarks: Use the stored procedure called by this implementation to set a policy on how long errors are kept in the log. The default implementation stores all errors for an indefinite time.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.GetErrors(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Returns a page of errors from the databse in descending order of logged time.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.GetError(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified error from the database, or null if it does not exist.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.NewError
member.summary: Creates a new and empty instance of the class.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this error log implementation.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.SqlErrorLog.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets the connection string used by the log to connect to the database.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog
member.summary: An implementation that uses memory as its backing store.
member.remarks: All instances will share the same memory store that is bound to the application (not an instance of this class).

member.name: F:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.MaximumSize
member.summary: The maximum number of errors that will ever be allowed to be stored in memory.

member.name: F:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.DefaultSize
member.summary: The maximum number of errors that will be held in memory by default if no size is specified.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a default size for maximum recordable entries.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specific size for maximum recordable entries.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.#ctor(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using a dictionary of configured settings.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.Log(GotDotNet.Elmah.Error)
member.summary: Logs an error to the application memory.
member.remarks: If the log is full then the oldest error entry is removed.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.GetError(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified error from application memory, or null if it does not exist.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.GetErrors(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Returns a page of errors from the application memory in descending order of logged time.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.MemoryErrorLog.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this error log implementation.

member.summary: A simple factory for creating instances of types specified in a section of the configuration file.

member.summary: Collection of utility methods that complement .

member.summary: Renders the contents of the control into the specified writer.

member.summary: Renders an HTML page displaying details about an error from the error log.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from a given instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from a given instance and instance representing the HTTP context during the exception.

member.summary: Returns the value of the property.

member.summary: Loads the error object from its XML representation.

member.summary: Reads the error data in XML attributes.

member.summary: Reads the error data in child nodes.

member.summary: Writes the error data to its XML representation.

member.summary: Writes the error data that belongs in XML attributes.

member.summary: Writes the error data that belongs in child nodes.

member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Exception
member.summary: Get the instance used to initialize this instance.
member.remarks: This is a run-time property only that is not written or read during XML serialization via and .

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of application in which this error occurred.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.HostName
member.summary: Gets or sets name of host machine where this error occurred.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Type
member.summary: Get or sets the type, class or category of the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source that is the cause of the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a brief text describing the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Detail
member.summary: Gets or sets a detailed text describing the error, such as a stack trace.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the user logged into the application at the time of the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Time
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time (in local time) at which the error occurred.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the output returned to the client for the error.
member.remarks: For cases where this value cannot always be reliably determined, the value may be reported as zero.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.WebHostHtmlMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML message generated by the web host (ASP.NET) for the given error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.ServerVariables
member.summary: Gets a collection representing the Web server variables captured as part of diagnostic data for the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.QueryString
member.summary: Gets a collection representing the Web query string variables captured as part of diagnostic data for the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Form
member.summary: Gets a collection representing the form variables captured as part of diagnostic data for the error.

member.name: P:GotDotNet.Elmah.Error.Cookies
member.summary: Gets a collection representing the client cookies captured as part of diagnostic data for the error.

member.name: T:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorRssHandler

member.summary: Formats a complete HTML document describing the given instance.

member.summary: Renders the <head> section of the HTML document.

member.summary: Renders the <body> section of the HTML document.

member.summary: Renders the footer content that appears at the end of the HTML document body.

member.name: M:GotDotNet.Elmah.ErrorMailHtmlFormatter.RenderStyle
member.summary: Renders the <style> element along with in-line styles used to format the body of the HTML document.

member.summary: Renders the details about the object in body of the HTML document.

member.summary: Renders a summary about the object in body of the HTML document.

member.summary: Renders a collection as a table in HTML document body.

member.summary: Gets the used for HTML formatting.

member.summary: Gets the object for which a HTML document is being formatted.
